ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Token
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
MIN_VALUE = -99
MAX_VALUE = 999

function onload(saved_data)
    light_mode = false

    val1 = 0
    val2 = 0
    val3 = 0
    val4 = 0
    val5 = 0
    val6 = 0
    zz = 0
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)

        val1 = loaded_data[2]
        val2 = loaded_data[2]
        val3 = loaded_data[2]
        val4 = loaded_data[2]
        val5 = loaded_data[2]
        val6 = loaded_data[2]
    end

    createAll()
end

function onCollisionEnter(collision_info, collision_object)
    obj = collision_info.collision_object
    if zz==0 then
        if collision_info.collision_object.hasTag("ScenarioCard") then
            self.addAttachment(obj)
            zz=2
        end
    end
end

function updateSave1()
    local data_to_save = {val1}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function updateSave2()
    local data_to_save = {val2}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function updateSave3()
    local data_to_save = {val3}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function updateSave4()
    local data_to_save = {val4}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function updateSave5()
    local data_to_save = {val5}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function updateSave6()
    local data_to_save = {val6}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function createAll()
   
        self.createButton({
        label=tostring(val1),
        click_function="add_subtract1",
        tooltip=ttText1,

        function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.1,-1.50},
        height=90,
        width=90,
    
        alignment = 1,
        scale={x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
        font_size=85,
        font_color= {0.9,0.9,0.9,100} ,
        color= {0,0.09,0.16,90}
    
        })

        self.createButton({
        label=tostring(val2),
        click_function="add_subtract2",
        tooltip=ttText2,
        function_owner=self,
        position={0.85,0.1,-1.65},
        height=90,
        width=90,
        alignment = 2,
    
        scale={x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
        font_size=85,
        font_color= {0.9,0.9,0.9,100},
        color= {0.39,0.42,0.36,80}
        })


        self.createButton({
        label=tostring(val3),
        click_function="add_subtract3",
        tooltip=ttText3,
        function_owner=self,
        position={-0.85,0.1,-1.65},
        height=90,
        width=90,
        alignment = 3,
        scale={x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
        font_size=85,
        font_color= {0.9,0.9,0.9,100},
        color= {0.43,0.27,0.21,80}
        })

        self.createButton({
        label=tostring(val4),
        click_function="add_subtract4",
        tooltip=ttText3,
        function_owner=self,
        position={2,0,-2},
        height=200,
        width=200,
        alignment = 4,
        scale={x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
        font_size=160,
        font_color={0.9,0.9,0.9,100},
        color= {0.39,0.21,0.12,90}
        })

        self.createButton({
        label=tostring(val5),
        click_function="add_subtract5",
        tooltip=ttText3,
        function_owner=self,
        position={-0.46,0.10,0.49},
        height=90,
        width=90,
        alignment = 5,
        scale={x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
        font_size=85,
        font_color= {0.9,0.9,0.9,100},
        color= {0.6,0.05,0.15,80}
        })

        self.createButton({
        label=tostring(val6),
        click_function="add_subtract6",
        tooltip=ttText3,
        function_owner=self,
        position={0.46,0.10,0.49},
        height=90,
        width=90,
        alignment = 6,
        scale={x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
        font_size=85,
        font_color= {0.9,0.9,0.9,100},
        color= {0.22,0.24,0.6,80}
        })


        self.createButton({
        label="[ Dettach ]",

        click_function="Separate",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.05,2.6},

        height=250,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=250,
        font_color= {0.9,0.9,0.9,100},
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })
       
        self.createButton({
        label="[ Reset ]",
        click_function="reset_val",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.05,-2.6},

        height=250,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=250,
        font_color= {0.9,0.9,0.9,100},
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })
end

function removeAll()
    self.removeInput(0)
    self.removeInput(1)
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.removeButton(2)
    self.removeButton(3)
end

function reloadAll()
    removeAll()
    createAll()

    updateSave1()
    updateSave2()
    updateSave3()
    updateSave4()
    updateSave5()
    updateSave6()
end


function Separate(collision_info, collision_object)
    self.removeAttachments()
    zz = 1
end

function add_subtract1(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value1 = math.min(math.max(val1 + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if val1 ~= new_value1 then
        val1 = new_value1
        updateVal1()
        updateSave1()
    end
end

function add_subtract2(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value2 = math.min(math.max(val2 + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if val2 ~= new_value2 then
        val2 = new_value2
        updateVal2()
        updateSave2()
    end
end

function add_subtract3(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value3 = math.min(math.max(val3 + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if val3 ~= new_value3 then
        val3 = new_value3
        updateVal3()
        updateSave3()
    end
end

function add_subtract4(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value4 = math.min(math.max(val4 + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if val4 ~= new_value4 then
        val4 = new_value4
        updateVal4()
        updateSave4()
    end
end

function add_subtract5(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value5 = math.min(math.max(val5 + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if val5 ~= new_value5 then
        val5 = new_value5
        updateVal5()
        updateSave5()
    end
end

function add_subtract6(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value6 = math.min(math.max(val6 + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if val6 ~= new_value6 then
        val6 = new_value6
        updateVal6()
        updateSave6()
    end
end


function updateVal1()
    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        label = tostring(val1)

    })
end

function updateVal2()
    self.editButton({
        index = 1,
        label = tostring(val2)

    })
end

function updateVal3()
    self.editButton({
        index = 2,
        label = tostring(val3)
    })
end

function updateVal4()

        self.editButton({
        index = 3,
        label = tostring(val4)
        })
end

function updateVal5()

        self.editButton({
        index = 4,
        label = tostring(val5)
        })
end

function updateVal6()

        self.editButton({
        index = 5,
        label = tostring(val6)
        })
end

function reset_val()
    val1 = 0
    val2 = 0
    val3 = 0
    val4 = 0
    val5 = 0
    val6 = 0
    zz = 0
    updateVal1()
    updateVal2()
    updateVal3()
    updateVal4()
    updateVal5()
    updateVal6()    
    updateSave1()
    updateSave2()
    updateSave3()
    updateSave4()
    
    updateSave5()
    updateSave6()
end


function null()
end

function keepSample(_obj, _string, value) 
    reloadAll()
end
